snippet.title: Heart of the Emberstone: Coliseum - VR Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Heart of the Emberstone: Coliseum FREE now!

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/767690/Heart_of_the_Emberstone_Coliseum/

Oculus: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1939867142691966/

Taken straight from the heart of adventure, Coliseum is a sandbox version of a level found in The Gallery: Heart of the Emberstone, made available FREE for virtual reality. Delve into the mystery, master the Gauntlet, and get a taste of the world of fantasy and adventure found in award-winning VR series The Gallery. 

Music by Stilz: http://www.stilzmusic.com/

Learn more at http://cloudheadgames.com/the-gallery/
